item.title: MIUI V13.0.4.0.SLFCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K50 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K50 Ultra China

Codename: diting

Version: V13.0.4.0.SLFCNXM | 12.0

Changelog:
[Highlights]

[Mi Smart Hub]
New: You can play sound on connected compatible devices to be able to find them
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: Image quality
Optimization: System stability
Optimization: System power consumption
Optimization: Game performance
[Other]
